name: Sneaky Barbarian
description:
Sneaky Barbarian is a combination of both the "Stealth/Sneak" and "Box Push" genres. In this game, you must sneak past certain enemies and push boxes into others to get to your end goal of each level, the key.

The game was programmed in 28 hours with the exception of minor
tweaks for assets, and assets created previously by members of the
OpenGameArt community. All assets are from OpenGameArt and their authors
listed in the credits section of the game.
